Text:
imagine how much faster torrents would be if people did not keep re uploading the same thing over and over..

for example rather than downloading this you could download and seed the one of the other peoples torrents that uploaded the EAT cracked version.

This is a non stop issue at TPB
no one uses the search engine and you have a TON of torrents with  handful of seeders instead of one or 2 torrents with 1,000's of high speed seeders.

Why does this happen so much at TPB ?
the only conclusion i can think of is Vanity. People want to develop a reputation around here, so there is always a ton of people jockeying for popularity.
LOL gotta love the internet.. nothing ever changes ;)
